data.name: Fraction Simplifier
data.description:
## Description

Your mission is to create a function ```fraction_simplifier()``` that receives a fraction in the format of two parameters: numerator and denominator. Your function should simplify the fraction and return it as a list.

If the numerator is smaller than the denominator, then it is a proper fraction. Just return a simplified version of it.

If the numerator is bigger than the denominator, then it is an improper fraction. Convert it to a mixed number (number and a fraction), making sure that it is in its simplest form.

If the fraction is already in its simplest form, just return the fraction as it is.
## Input --> Output:

```fraction_simplifier(125, 1000) --> [1, 8]``` one eighth

```fraction_simplifier(325, 10) --> [32, 1, 2]``` thirty-two and a half

```fraction_simplifier(20, 2) --> [10, 1]``` ten

```fraction_simplifier(5, 7) --> [5, 7]``` five sevenths

## Constraints

- 1 <= numerator <= 500
- 1 <= denominator <= 500

Have a fabulous time coding!
